name: KKT-based reformulation
desc: Replace follower by KKT conditions (requires regularity; complementarity handling).

name: Strong duality/value function
desc: Use dual reformulation (often for linear/convex followers).

name: Nested EA
desc: Upper EA calls lower solver per candidate; expensive but simple.

name: Surrogate-assisted bilevel
desc: Approximate lower response or objectives to reduce cost.

name: Machine learning for BLO
desc: Learning-guided solvers, surrogates, and differentiable approaches.

name: Learning-to-optimize
desc: Learn update rules or warm-starts for bilevel problems.

name: Implicit differentiation
desc: Differentiate through follower optimum under conditions; used in hyperparameter tuning.

name: Energy systems
desc: Market bidding, pricing, V2G coordination, planning.
